name: javascript-model
description: Stand-alone Javascript Model to represent documents and collections of documents
author: Ronald Borla

scripts.build: npm run softbuild && npm run uglify
scripts.watch:html: nodemon -e html,ts --ignore dist/ --ignore node_modules/ -x 'npm run build:html'
scripts.watch:test: nodemon -e html,js --ignore dist/ --ignore node_modules/ --ignore src/ -x 'npm run test'
scripts.watch:script: nodemon -e ts --ignore dist/ --ignore node_modules/ --ignore test/ -x 'npm run softbuild'
